bioconda.name: bioconductor-arrmnormalization
bioconda.summary: Adaptive Robust Regression normalization for Illumina methylation data

biotools.summary: Perform the Adaptive Robust Regression method (ARRm) for the normalization of methylation data from the Illumina Infinium HumanMethylation 450k assay.

bioschemas.name: ARRmNormalization
bioschemas.summary: Perform the Adaptive Robust Regression method (ARRm) for the normalization of methylation data from the Illumina Infinium HumanMethylation 450k assay.
